biotools.summary: The tool calculates the equilibrium distribution of graph-distances between arbitrary pair of nucleotides in an RNA molecule. The program reads RNA structures generated from RNAsubopt, calculates their equilibrium distribution and outputs the graph-distances in a tab delimited list or in the terminal.

bioschemas.name: RNAgraphdist
bioschemas.summary: The tool calculates the equilibrium distribution of graph-distances between arbitrary pair of nucleotides in an RNA molecule. The program reads RNA structures generated from RNAsubopt, calculates their equilibrium distribution and outputs the graph-distances in a tab delimited list or in the terminal.
